time.help: The timestamp for the final block in the window in UNIX format.
time.name: time

txcount.help: The total number of transactions in the chain up to that point.
txcount.name: txcount

window_block_count.help: Size of the window in number of blocks.
window_block_count.name: window_block_count

window_tx_count.help: The number of transactions in the window. Only returned if 'window_block_count' is > 0.
window_tx_count.name: window_tx_count

window_interval.help: The elapsed time in the window in seconds. Only returned if 'window_block_count' is > 0.
window_interval.name: window_interval

txrate.help: The average rate of transactions per second in the window. Only returned if 'window_interval' is > 0.
txrate.name: txrate
